'Holy crap... What is all this?'%K%P
I couldn't help but stare at the miracle she created.%K%P
'Well? What do you think?\nIt's on a whole new level, huh?'%K%P
'Forget levels, this is like something brand new!'%K%P
It was like I was living in a dream.%K%P
If Eden was real, this was probably what it was like.%K%P
'Your Sakimitama is pretty impressive, too.\nThat's why I was able to pull this off.'%K%P
'R-Really?\nI guess it's a good thing I'm so obsessed with you.'%K%P
'And me with you.\nInstead of just showing our feelings to each other,\nsharing those feelings seems to be more effective.'%K%P
Now that we both understood our feelings,\nshe was able to produce all sorts of divine miracles.%K%P
The power of love sure is something.%K%P
'I think my power is enough.\nNow I just need to incorporate it into a song.'%K%P
'I wish I could say 'leave that to me!' but\nmaybe we should talk it out together?'%K%P
'I want this to be a collaborative effort.'%K%P
'A show made by the two of us, huh.'%K%P
'Okay, let's come here for practice during the day,\nand work on our planning at your place at night.'%K%P
'I'm... Not sure how long I can handle our nights...'%K%P
'Can't hold back those kisses?'%K%P
'But I won't have it! Work before play.\nOnce we're done though, I'll kiss you to sleep!'%K%P
Now that we had shared a kiss,\nshe didn't seem to mind as much.%K%P
It was still kind of awkward and embarrassing,\nbut neither of us thought badly of it.%K%P
Our relationship had successfully become\nquite touchy-feely.%K%P
A few days later.%K%P
Our relationship continued to deepen,\nand we kept working on her audition piece.%K%P
'Ah, okay.\nThis is when I should use my Jinriki, huh?'%K%P
'Yeah, if you can pull it off right at the climax,\nI'm sure the audience will go wild.'%K%P
'Good idea. How about we change up\nthe choreography to match it, then?'%K%P
'Hmm...\nYeah, even just a gesture change could do the trick.'%K%P
'Okay, let's work that out tomorrow, then.'%K%P
We worked together like this every night.%K%P
We'd watch videos of other idol groups,\nand review stuff from Loveâ˜†Kami.%K%P
The more we went at it,\nthe more we found we could do.%K%P
'Alrighty then, why don't we call it a night?'%K%P
'Sounds good. Let's just shower up and get to bed.'%K%P
'Yeah...'%K%P
My parents were already asleep.%K%P
It was time for just the two of us.%K%P
At Shuri's suggestion we headed for the bathroom.%K%P
'Okay, I'm gonna go in first...'%K%P
She faced away from me\nas she undressed and headed in.%K%P
'Don't be long!'%K%P
'Yeah yeah.'%K%P
After a quick scrub down we got in the bath together.%K%P
Right before my eyes was Shuri in all her glory.%K%P
'Just... Don't stare so much, okay?'%K%P
'You say that every time.'%K%P
'Because it's embarrassing every time.'%K%P
We had been bathing together like this\nfor the past three days or so.%K%P
Together, naked, while my parents couldn't catch us.%K%P
'Hey now... Watch where you're looking...'%K%P
'Hey, you're the one who wanted to do this.'%K%P
'Didn't you want to do it too, though?'%K%P
'Of course I did. Wait, did you?'%K%P
'It's embarrassing, but... Yeah...'%K%P
Shyness was just another flavor of love.%K%P
The sense of being watched had us both worked up.%K%P
'Are you sure it's okay for me\nto do this with a goddess?'%K%P
'A little late for that, don't you think?\nYou'd already be fried to a crisp\nif that was not the case.'%K%P
Note to self: Avoid divine punishment.%K%P
It sent a shiver down my spine.%K%P
'Okay, so I know it's okay to love a goddess,\nbut you're also an idol, right?'%K%P
'True... I do sometimes wonder if doing this is like,\nagainst idol rules or something.'%K%P
'But ever since we started dating I've really\nbeen able to display my true powers and all, so...'%K%P
'I'm sure that if I lost my feelings for you\nI wouldn't really be myself anymore.'%K%P
'That's right, the real Shuri is the one\nthat loves me.'%K%P
'I couldn't push you away even if I wanted to.'%K%P
'So I don't think there's any point in hiding it.\nI'm gonna take on these auditions as the real me.'%K%P
'Well, let's make sure we put on the best possible\nshow for those fans of yours, then.'%K%P
'Yeah.'%K%P
She finally was smiling like normal again.%K%P
During our little chat she was finally able to\novercome her shyness, at least for a moment.%K%P
'Hey though, I like how your skin gets all flushed\npink when we're in the bath like this.'%K%P
'W-Why change the subject suddenly?'%K%P
'Hey, I was just saying I like it.'%K%P
'I was just finally getting comfortable, too!\nNow you've gone and got me all hot and bothered.'%K%P
'You're just too adorable.\nI could just pet you like a little kitty.'%K%P
'Definitely no petting.'%K%P
'How about a kiss, then...?'%K%P
'No kisses!\nThat's all for AFTER our bath, okay?'%K%P
'Don't worry you'll get your lovey-dovey time later.'%K%P
Oh boy would I ever. As soon as we were done here.%K%P
Hugging, kissing, getting all close,\nall the things that lovers can't go without.%K%P
